meanings.definition: The state or quality of being final.
meanings.sent1: The finalities of the game brought a sense of closure to the players.
meanings.sent2: After much discussion, they reached the finalities of their decision.
meanings.sent3: The finalities of the movie left the audience feeling satisfied.
meanings.sent4: The finalities of the contract signing marked the end of negotiations.
meanings.sent5: The finalities of the exam results were met with relief by the students.

meanings.definition: The final part or summing up of something.
meanings.sent1: As the finalities of the story unfolded, the mystery was solved.
meanings.sent2: The finalities of the presentation summarized all the key points.
meanings.sent3: The finalities of the recipe involved adding the finishing touches.
meanings.sent4: The finalities of the journey were captured in a single photograph.
meanings.sent5: The finalities of the meeting were concluded with a round of applause.

meanings.sent1: The finalities of the experiment revealed unexpected findings.
meanings.sent2: After hours of hard work, they achieved the finalities of their project.
meanings.sent3: The finalities of the race left everyone breathless with anticipation.
meanings.sent4: The finalities of the election were announced to a waiting crowd.
meanings.sent5: The finalities of the negotiation led to a successful partnership.
